WorkflowInfo.Name: Scan For File
WorkflowInfo.Description: Scan multiple computers for a specific file
WorkflowInfo.Xoml: <SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=4.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:DisplayValue;Assembly=DisplayValue, Version=4.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=4.6.1.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=4.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:RunWorkflow;Assembly=RunWorkflow, Version=4.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:FileExist;Assembly=FileExist, Version=4.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=4.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:MemorySet;Assembly=MemorySet, Version=4.6.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:GetRowsCount x:Name="NumOfComputers" IsValid="True" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." TypeName="GetRowsCount" ResultSetName="Parent.ComputersToScan" ResultSet="%Parent.ComputersToScan%" DisplayName="Get Rows Count" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns2:ExitWhile x:Name="exitWhile1" IsValid="True" Counter="%NumOfComputers%" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Exit current while activity" TypeName="ExitWhile" DisplayName="Exit While" /> <ns3:GetCellValue x:Name="Name" IsValid="True" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ColumnType="Number" ColumnNumber="1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." TypeName="GetCellValue" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ResultSetName="Parent.ComputersToScan" ResultSet="%Parent.ComputersToScan%" DisplayName="Get Cell Value" /> <ns4:RunWorkflow x:Name="runWorkflow1" WorkflowName="Name To IPAddress" IsValid="True" WorkflowID="0" RunInBackground="False" Description="Run an existing workflow" TypeName="RunWorkflow" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Run Workflow" /> <ns5:FileExist x:Name="fileExist1" Password="724261384466624B6B33424F776B684C7A6A667934513D3D" HostId="-2" IsValid="True" HostName="%runWorkflow1.IPAddress%" Timeout="00:01:00" UserName="localhost\administrator" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Checks if file exists." TypeName="FileExist" Path="%Parent.Folder%\%Parent.FileName%" TimeInSeconds="0" DisplayName="File Exists" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns6:ReturnValue Formula="=Equals(&&&,True)" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionNumber="-1" IsValid="True" Value="True" ConditionType="" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." Type="StoredValue" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" TypeName="ReturnValue" UseCustomeCondition="False" x:Name="returnValue1" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" DisplayName="Return Value" /> <ns7:MemorySet x:Name="memorySet1" IsSaved="False" IsValid="True" VariableScope="Workflow" VariableValue="%Name%" VariableName="ServerList" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Set variable to specified memory scope." TypeName="MemorySet" IsAppend="True" DisplayName="Set Memory" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns6:ReturnValue Formula="{x:Null}" UseStoredValue="True" ConditionNumber="0" IsValid="True" Value="Default Branch" ConditionType="" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." Type="StoredValue" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" ConditionName="" TypeName="ReturnValue" UseCustomeCondition="False" x:Name="returnValue2" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" DisplayName="Return Value" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns1:DisplayValue x:Name="displayValue1" HostId="-2" IsValid="True" HostName="{x:Null}" Timeout="00:01:00" ValueToDisplay="%ServerList%" DisplayName="Display Value" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" Description="Display a value to the log." TypeName="DisplayValue" TimeInSeconds="0" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details:
Information
This workflow searches for a file on a list of servers, and returns the list of servers where the file was found. This workflow should be set in a Run Workflow activity of a parent workflow (act as a child workflow).

Requirements:
* Workflow named Name To IPAddress should exist and be verified.
* All end servers listed in the input variable ComputerToScan should be accessible.

Input Variables (variables recieved from the parent workflow):
* ComputersToScan - a table that consists a list of servers - Name or IP.
* Folder - the path to the folder where the file should be searched.
* FileName - the name of the file that the workflow is searching.

Output (variable that will be read in the parent workflow):
* ServerList - a list of all the servers in which the file was found.
